name: Commando Zombies V2 (Call of Duty 2D)
description:
CALL OF DUTY IN SCRATCH!!! V.2!!!

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/96889897 V2 in Scratch

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/11145758/ V1 in Scratch

You have to fight zombies, survive, rebuild barriers and make score!

*NEW: Barriers have 5 sitcks instead of 3!

*NEW: You can pick One-shot-kill and Reconstruction (BONUSES)!!! The bonuses will last 8 sec. before you pick them, and they'll help you for 30 sec.

+The bonuses don't waste until you're In-Round!

+Reconstruction will auto-repair barriers for a while!

+1SK will let you kill with only 1 bullet!

*NEW: You start withCZ75, remember to reload!

*PLEASE THROW ONE GRENADE AT A TIME!!!

-4 Second Grenade Cooking!!!

*NEW: Grenades has 5 SEC. timing with precision!!!

You can buy weapons:

*NEW: +MP5K(Machine Gun)

          +Olympia8S(Shotgun created by me[8 shells])

*NEW:Find the speaker with music and shot at it with MP5K!

Help+Controls in game!
